caseTitle: Federation of Pakistan th. Secretary M/o Communications, Islamabad & another v. Shuja Sharif & others
tagline: Section 45 of National Highways Safety Ordinance, 2000 deals with the control of traffic in the interest of public safety or convenience. Imposition of ban of motorcyclists at motorways is permissible under Section 45 of the Ordinance. Articles 4 & 9 of the Constitution. Judicial review and judicial overreach.
